title: Pixel fonts
content: I'm writing paper on pixel fonts and wanted to know where I could get some more information.
author: dona

comments.content:
Minifonts.com is the work of Joe Gillespie, also   
founder of WPDFD.com.   
   
There are interviews with Matthew Bardram and   
Joe Gillespie in the [Typophile Interviews](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018212938/http:/typophile.com/articles).

Check out my collection of pixel font links (I call them bitmap fonts) on [http://www.softshoeshuffler.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018212938/http:/www.softshoeshuffler.com/).   
   
It's a copycat site that I am working on. A collection of links I like from forums, font sites, etc...
